name: WindowsShareManagement
description: Create and/or maintain a Windows SMB Share.
author: Peter Barendse
helpMarkDown: Create and/or maintain a Windows SMB Share, using WinRM.

inputs.name: Servers
inputs.label: Server(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the server names. Multiple entries should be comma seperated (server.domain.loc).

inputs.name: UseSSL
inputs.label: Use HTTPS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use HTTP or HTTPS for the WinRM connection with the machine(s).

inputs.name: CheckCA
inputs.label: Skip CA check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to skip validating the authenticity of the machine's certificate from a trusted certification authority. The parameter is required for the WinRM HTTPS protocol.

inputs.name: FolderLocation
inputs.label: Folder Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder that needs to be shared. It will be created if it doesn't exist yet .

inputs.name: ReadPermissions
inputs.label: Read permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define the users or groups who are granted read permissions. Multiple entries are allowed and need to be comma seperated (domain\user1,domain\group1).

inputs.name: ChangePermissions
inputs.label: Change permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define the users or groups who are granted change/modify permissions. Multiple entries are allowed and need to be comma seperated (domain\user1,domain\group1).

inputs.name: FullAccessPermissions
inputs.label: Full Access Permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Define the users or groups who are granted full access permissions. Multiple entries are allowed and need to be comma seperated (domain\user1,domain\group1).

Note: BUILTIN\Administrators receive these permissions by default.

inputs.name: NoAccessPermissions
inputs.label: Deny permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define the users or groups who are granted Deny permissions. Multiple entries are allowed and need to be comma seperated (domain\user1,domain\group1).
